p: Dengue viral RNA was extracted from NS1 positive serum samples using the pure link RNA mini kit (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, USA) according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions. Clarified human serum sample of 150 microliters volume was used for RNA isolation. All RNA samples were examined for their purity and concentration using Nano photometer (2000C; Thermo Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA).
